akn:content.akn:p: Subject to subsection (b) of this section, a disposition of assets under ยง 29-1014.02 shall be approved by:
The organic rules may require that the percentage of votes under subsection (a)(1) of this section shall be:

Subject to any contractual obligations, after a disposition of assets is approved and at any time before the consummation of the disposition, a limited cooperative association may approve an amendment to the contract for disposition or the resolution authorizing the disposition or approve abandonment of the disposition:
The voting requirements for districts, classes, or voting groups under ยง 29-1004.04 apply to approval of a disposition of assets under this subchapter.
